title: Fontlab x-height adjustment
content:
How is the x-height guide adjusted in FontLab 4?   
   
Also does anyone know of any good tutorials for FontLab?   
   
Thankyou
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content:
Jonathan,   
   
1. By dragging the x-height guide. Make sure vertical metrics are unlocked (View / Lock Layers).   
   
2. Soon, a book by Leslie Cabarga, "Learn FontLab fast" will be available: [http://www.logofontandlettering.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526121057/http:/www.logofontandlettering.com/)  
   
Adam Twardoch
